data.text: @scorpio1019 We are following the CDC definition of a "fully vaccinated" individual which can be found here: https://t.co/gFOxEXypcX
@AnimeBoston Hello. I’ve read your covid protocols for anime Boston. I just have one question, since I’m fully vaccinated and I have my card do I need a booster shot as well ???
@sunflower__king @AnimeBoston I just wish they would confirm whether or not they might weaken the policies at a later date. Knowing would make me more comfortable spending so much on some tickets.
@AnimeBoston Can you take a picture on your cellphone and show it over there.
@ClaudeCayard29 more information on what will be allowed as proof of vaccination will be announced at a later time
@DirenzIan No, our staff guidelines regarding COVID will also be changing to align with this policy
@AnimeBoston Can we show a photo of a card that we've been vaccinated in the booster
@AnimeBoston So Staff/Volunteers are allowed proof of exemptions, but attendees aren’t? Something aint right here.
